Package org.w3c.jigsaw.ssi

Class Summary
DelayedInputStream Used to delay the (perhaps expensive) creation of a real stream until the first access.
Segment Represents a segment within the parsed content
SegmentArrayAttribute Attribute used to make the document segment information persistent.
SSIFrame This resource implements server-side parsing of HTML documents.
